translation.aboutMe: Sorry, you do not have access to this page. This page is restricted to certain personnel only. If you believe this is an error, please contact the HR department. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
translation.authenticationerror: Authentication error. This page is for internal personnel use only. If you believe this is an error, please contact HR or IT department. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
translation.clickDateForLeave: Click date to view leave form.
translation.confirmDeleteLeave: Are you sure you want to delete the leave record for {{deliverDate}} with reason {{attendance}}?
translation.contactHRForAssistance: If you have any questions, please contact the HR department for assistance. Thank you!
translation.enableLocationPrompt: If you have previously denied access to or disabled location services, please re-enable location in the backend.
translation.endTimeAfterStartTime: End time must be after start time
translation.errormsgcontent1: This page requires authorization to view
translation.errormsgcontent2: Client certificate has expired or does not have permission for this page
translation.internalservererror: Internal server error. Please contact the IT department for resolution. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
translation.leavePageDescription: This page is for viewing your own leave list and applying for leave.
translation.locationServiceRequired: Location service required for punching! Please ensure your location feature is enabled.
translation.locationSystemFetching: It may also be the phone's location system fetching the position, please wait a moment.
translation.name: Name
translation.reasonMaxLength: Reason can have at most 250 characters
translation.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred, possibly exceeding the leave deadline
translation.unexpectedErrorContactIT: An unexpected error occurred, please contact IT department.
translation.unsavedChanges: Your changes have not been saved. Are you sure you want to close the form?
translation.warningtext1: Please note that device system differences or the lack of enabled location accuracy may result in current location deviation!
